description:
Monday, November 18, 2013 (7:00 PM) - Monday, November 18, 2013 (9:00 PM)
Location: Andersen Auditorium, Haas School of Business

Entrepreneurship Week kicks off with a keynote by Quinn Slack, founder of Sourcegraph. The presentation will be followed by a panel with founders of Sequoia Capital, Y-Combinator, and A16z backed companies sharing their entrepreneurial journey. Panelists include:

Quinn Slack- Founder of Sourcegraph

Alon Salant – Founder of Good Eggs (Sequoia Capital Series A)

Matt DeBergalis – Founder of Meteor (YC S11', a16z backed)

Adam Ely – Founder of Bluebox (a16z backed)

Josh Buckley – Founder of Minomonsters (YC W11')

Anson Tsui – Founder of SpoonRocket(YC S13')

Darshan Shankar- Founder of Flotype(YC W11'),  Panel Moderator
